00033 TableInfo::TableInfo(MasterClientPtr &master_client_ptr,
00034                      const TableIdentifier *identifier, SchemaPtr &schema_ptr)
00035     : m_mutex(), m_master_client_ptr(master_client_ptr),
00036       m_identifier(*identifier), m_schema(schema_ptr) {

00040 void TableInfo::dump_range_table() {
00041   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00042   for (RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.begin();
00043        iter != m_range_map.end(); ++iter) {
00044     cout << m_identifier.name << "[" << (*iter).second->start_row() << ".."
00045          << (*iter).second->end_row() << "]" << endl;
00046   }
00047 }

00052 bool TableInfo::get_range(const RangeSpec *range, RangePtr &range_ptr) {
00053   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00054   string end_row = range->end_row;
00055 
00056   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(end_row);
00057 
00058   if (iter == m_range_map.end()) {
00059     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"TableInfo couldn't find end row ("<< end_row <<")"<< HT_END;
00060 
00061     for (iter = m_range_map.begin(); iter != m_range_map.end(); ++iter)
00062       HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"TableInfo map: "<< (*iter).first << HT_END;
00063 
00064     return false;
00065   }
00066 
00067   range_ptr = (*iter).second;
00068 
00069   string start_row = range_ptr->start_row();
00070 
00071   if (strcmp(start_row.c_str(), range->start_row)) {
00072     HT_INFO_OUT <<"TableInfo start row mismatch '" << start_row << "' != '"
00073                 << range->start_row << "'" << HT_END;
00074     return false;
00075   }
00076 
00077   return true;
00078 }

00084 bool TableInfo::remove_range(const RangeSpec *range, RangePtr &range_ptr) {
00085   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00086   string end_row = range->end_row;
00087 
00088   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(end_row);
00089 
00090   if (iter == m_range_map.end())
00091     return false;
00092 
00093   range_ptr = (*iter).second;
00094 
00095   string start_row = range_ptr->start_row();
00096 
00097   if (strcmp(start_row.c_str(), range->start_row))
00098     return false;
00099 
00100   m_range_map.erase(iter);
00101 
00102   return true;
00103 }

00110 void TableInfo::add_range(RangePtr &range_ptr) {
00111   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00112   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(range_ptr->end_row());
00113   assert(iter == m_range_map.end());
00114   m_range_map[range_ptr->end_row()] = range_ptr;
00115 }
00116 
00117 
00121 bool TableInfo::find_containing_range(std::string row, RangePtr &range_ptr) {
00122   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00123 
00124   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.lower_bound(row);
00125 
00126   if (iter == m_range_map.end())
00127     return false;
00128 
00129   if (row <= (*iter).second->start_row())
00130     return false;
00131 
00132   range_ptr = (*iter).second;
00133 
00134   return true;
00135 }
00136 
00137 
00138 void TableInfo::get_range_vector(std::vector<RangePtr> &range_vec) {
00139   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00140   for (RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.begin();
00141        iter != m_range_map.end(); ++iter)
00142     range_vec.push_back((*iter).second);
00143 }

00146 void TableInfo::clear() {
00147   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00148   m_range_map.clear();
00149 }

00155 TableInfo *TableInfo::create_shallow_copy() {
00156   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00157   return new TableInfo(m_master_client_ptr, &m_identifier, m_schema);
00158 }
